title: Where to specify CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX ?
body_html:
Hi, I'm using the command NO_TEST=1 USE_MKLDNN=1 FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py build
to build pytorch, but where to specify CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX ?

Without specifying CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX, CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX will be ./torch/lib/tmp_install by default, which is NOT what I expected. I'm expecting the built file to be installed under /usr/local ...

Any suggestions please?

Pei

body:
Hi, I'm using the command `NO_TEST=1 USE_MKLDNN=1 FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py build`
to build **pytorch**, but where to specify **CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX** ?

Without specifying **CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX**, **CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX** will be **./torch/lib/tmp_install** by default, which is NOT what I expected. I'm expecting the built file to be installed under **/usr/local** ...

Any suggestions please?

Pei
